RecordOperationSpec.Name: Sponsorship Location Report Recipient Delete
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Remove the Report Recipient from a Sponsorship Location
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIPLOCATION_REPORTRECIPIENT_DELETE ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
update dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONEXTENSION set REPORTRECIPIENTID = null, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED = getdate() where ID = @ID
return 0;
end

StandardPrompt.Text: Are you sure you want to remove the report recipient?
